title: Strengths and Weaknesses: College Students with Learn (TEFC)
brief_description: Four students share their experiences and feelings and four professionals explore possible adjustments and compensation relative to learning disabilities. The students emphasis on what they do provides optimistic prognosis for their academic survival.
